column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I really liked the restaurant
column3: vibe was amazing. Prices were reasonable. I don't think I would take my kids again. The menu selection is delicious however it's minimal because they have an amazing chef. The staff
column4: waiters are awesome. One or two things were forgotten but they didn't charge us. Friendly environment
column5: great location. Inside outside seating. The drinks were delicious.
